Summary: While hunting with my Buddy, we both witnessed this weird humming noise that moved at a warp speed directly over our heads..
trends: There has been one other sighting in Richmond
There were no other sightings in Richmond on or around November 12th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsOn November 12, 2012, at approximately 5:30 am, My Buddy, and I , were hunting for deer at a Rhode Island State Park. We traveled on foot, down a trail, and we walked deep into the forest reserve. It was almost dawn, and visibility was rather low. All of a sudden, we both heard an unknown humming noise, that had a pulsating sound effect, that traveled swiftly right above our heads. We didn't see the object, however, I am in the U.S. Air Force Reserves, and I never witnessed such a sound from an aircraft. Later that week, other witnesses, reported their sightings to our local news station, WJAR NBC10. An unknown object, was seen around the Cranston area. There is a photo of this UFO, posted in their website. I am not crazy, and this event is something that just happened to us, that I can't explain. I felt so strongly about this ordeal, that I decided to reach out to MUFON.
